page.syntax: Group_List as C = a5ws_Get_Groups([* Localrequest [,L FlagWeb ]])

argument.name: Group_List
argument.description: A list of security groups in the current web project.

argument.name: Localrequest
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. This variable explicitly passes all request variables to the function. Required if run from a web page.

argument.name: FlagWeb
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .F. .
.T. = Format suitable for use in a list, checkbox, or radio control on a web page
.F. = CR-LF delimited list

page.description: Show a CR-LF list of web groups for the current project. FlagWeb default value is .F. FlagWeb = .T. will output list in a format used in web components for checkboxes, radio buttons, list boxes and dropdowns. 'Request' pointer must be provided if run in web page.
page.discussion: The A5WS_Get_Groups() function returns a list of security groups defined for the current web project. It can be used without parameters to return a list of groups defined for the current selected web project. It can be used on a web page or in a web componetn event to retrieve a list of user security groups for use in a check box control, a dropdown list, a radio lbutton list, or a listbox control in a dialog component. Typically used in the Server Activate event of a dialog component.

item.name: 1. Display the Form > Properties menu page of the Dialog Builder.
2. Click in the Server Events > Activate property.

section.title: Example
section.example:
? A5WS_Get_Groups() = Accounting Administrators Marketing
'on web page or in component event grouplist = a5ws_get_groups(request,.T.)

see.ref: Returns a list of security groups defined for the current web project
